scripts.test:every: npm run test && npm run test:my-app && npm run test:core && npm run test:shared && npm run test:hyphen && npm run test:complexe && npm run test:complexe2 && npm run test:likeme
scripts.test:my-app: echo "test without special characters" && jest --findRelatedTests src/my-app
scripts.test:core: echo "test with special character and core word" && jest --findRelatedTests src/@core/my-lib
scripts.test:shared: echo "test with special character and shared word" && jest --findRelatedTests src/@shared/my-lib
scripts.test:hyphen: echo "test with special character and hyphen" && jest --findRelatedTests src/@name-with-hyphen/my-lib
scripts.test:complexe: echo "test with special characters" && jest --findRelatedTests src/@$_(ok)/my-lib
scripts.test:complexe2: echo "test with special characters 2" && jest --findRelatedTests src/@_(ok)/my-lib
scripts.test:likeme: echo "test with long path like in my app" && jest --findRelatedTests src/app/@core/store/store.ts
